titleInfo.title: Brown using his own camera on the set of "Idiot's Delight"

mods.abstract: Clarence Brown using his own camera on the set of "Idiot's Delight." The movie (based on the play of the same name by Robert Sherwood) stars Clark Gable as entertainer Harry Van. Van and his partner Madame Zuleika (Laura Hope Crews) have developed a "psychic" act in which Van gives the blindfolded Zuleika cues that allow her to accurately describe a member of the audience. Zuleika becomes so drunk, however, that she confuses her prompts (even when reminded loudly from offstage by Irene Fellara) and the couple are booed off stage. Years later, Van and Fellara (Norma Shearer) meet in a hotel in Geneva and a series of antics ensue. The pair's shallow lives provide a vivid counterpoint to a world on the brink of war.
